column5: Women of all nationalities must cover their body with clothing except for their face hands and feet

There are no visa requirements for entry into Andorra but it can only be accessed by passing through France or Spain. A multiple entry visa is required to re-enter either France or Spain when leaving Andorra.
Permanent Residents of Canada do not need a visa and may stay up to 30 days.
Visa procedure does not necessitate sending passport to Barbados or one of its embassies.
